QuestData.Title: Buried Below
QuestData.Description: <You attach the arch to the rod, and the artifact is nearly complete. A large gap still sits at the center of the holy symbol's head.>$B$B<Once again you feel it tug your arm, urging you towards the hole in the wall and the winding tunnel ahead. The last piece must be through there.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the tunnel under the Dawning Woods Catacombs for the Lightforged Crest.
QuestData.RewardText: <In the darkest depths of this earthen tunnel, you spy the faintest gleam. The last piece is found!>
